title: Bug 37095BIDI  When starting Eclipse from Arabic locale it is always RTL oriented
description: Bug 37095BIDIWhen starting Eclipse from Arabic locale it is always RTL oriented
OB: When starting an Eclipse instance from an Arabic Locale, the workbench and itscomponents are RTLoriented without giving the user the choice for otherwise.
SR: When starting an Eclipse instance from an Arabic Locale, the workbench and itscomponents are RTLoriented without giving the user the choice for otherwise.
